name: OMR-IGG-AM 5 %
treatmentDescriptions: Replacement therapy     * PRIMARY immunodeficiency (patients with PRIMARY defective antibody synthesis such as agammaglobulinemia OR hypogammaglobulinemia)     * Myeloma OR chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) with severe secondary hypogammaglobulinemia AND recurrent infections.     * Children with congenital AIDS AND recurrent infections    - Immunomodulation     * Idiopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (ITP)     * Guillain Barre Syndrome     * Kawasaki Disease    - Allogenic Bone Marrow Transplantation

atc5.name: IMMUNOGLOBULINS, NORMAL HUMAN, FOR INTRAVASCULAR ADM.

warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לשימוש בבתי חולים או אשפוז יום
